name: Tequila Sunset
ingredients:
• 50ml tequila
• 200ml orange juice
• 25ml cherry sours
• Orange slice, garnish
method:
1) In a highball glass filled with ice cubes, pour the tequila and orange juice.
2) Stir well.
3) Add cherry sours.
4) Garnish with an orange slice.
description: A tequila sunrise... but with a twist.

name: Blue Lagoon
method:
1) Put ice cubes into a hurricane glass.
2) Pour over the curaçao, vodka, and lemonade.
3) Stir well.
4) Garnish with lemon.

name: Espresso Martini
ingredients:
• 25ml Kahlúa
• 50ml Vodka
• 1 shot espresso
• 1/2 egg white
method:
1) Put ice into a Martini glass (to chill the glass).
2) Add ice, Kahlúa, Vodka, espresso shot, and egg white into a Boston Shaker.
3) Shake well
4) Remove ice from the Martini glass and strain contents of shaker into a Martini glass
description: A sharp coffee based cocktail to kick off the night.

name: Aperol Spritz
method:
1) Put a few cubes of ice into a glass
2) Add a Aperol and prosecco
3) Top up with lemonade
description: Italian cocktail made with prosecco and Aperol.

name: Vodka Martini
ingredients:
• 60ml Vodka
• 1 tbsp dry vermouth
• olive or lemon peel, to garnish
method:
1) Stir the vodka, dry vermouth and a little ice together or put them in a cocktail shaker to combine.
2) Strain into a chilled martini glass. Serve with an olive on a cocktail stick or a twist of lemon peel.
description: Easy and eligent vodka cocktail. Shaken, not stirred.

name: Yoda
ingredients:
• 25ml blue curaçao
• 25ml creme de banana
• 1 bottle VK Orange
method:
1) Fill a 16oz glass with ice.
2) Add blue curaçao and creme de banana.
3) Add the full bottle of VK.
4) Stir well.
description: Refreshing green drink using Orange VK.

name: Sex on the Beach
ingredients:
• 50ml vodka
• 25ml peach schnapps
• orange
• cranberry juice
method:
1) Fill two tall glasses with ice cubes.
2) Add the vodka, peach schnapps and fruit juices.
3) Stir well.
4) Garnish with orange slices.

name: Cosmopolitan
ingredients:
• 50ml lemon vodka
• 25ml triple sec
• cranberry juice
• lime juice
method:
1) Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.
2) Strain into a cocktail glass.
3) Garnish with a lemon peel.
description: Sharp cranberry vodka drink served in a martini glass.

name: Zombie
ingredients:
• 25ml dark rum
• 25ml white rum
•25ml triple sec
• 50ml lime juice
• lime
• pineapple juice
• orange juice
• overproof rum (optional)
• orange
method:
1) Pour the rums, triple sec, lime juice and fruit juices into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
2) Shake well.
3) Strain the mixture into a tall glass or hurricane glass filled with ice.
4) Garnish with a slice of orange.
5) Optional: Cut a lime in half, make a hole in it with a spoon (saving the juice for later), balance upright on top of the cocktail, fill with overproof rum and ignite!
description: Named after the effect it has on people that drink it.

name: Tequila Sunrise
ingredients:
• 50ml tequila
• 200ml orange juice
• 25ml grenadine syrup
• Orange slice, garnish
method:
1) In a highball glass filled with ice cubes, pour the tequila and orange juice.
2) Stir well.
3) Slowly pour the grenadine around the inside edge of the glass.
4) Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Woo Woo
ingredients:
• 50ml vodka
• 25ml peach schnapps
• 100ml cranberry juice
• lime
method:
1) Fill a cocktail shaker with ice then add the vodka, peach schnapps, cranberry juice and a few drops of lime juice.
2) Shake well.
3) Strain into a glass.
4) Garnish with a wedge of lime.
description: Sharp and fruity cranberry vodka drink.

name: Cuba Libre
method:
1) Add ice to a glass.
2) Add rum.
3) Add lime and stir.
4) Garnish with slices of lime.
description: Cubian classic rum and coke with lime.

name: Godfather
method:
1) Fill a glass with ice then add the whiskey, amaretto, cola and a teaspoon of lime juice.
2) Stir well.
3) Garnish with a wedge of lime.
description: A long cocktail composed of whiskey, amaretto and coke.
